tha-ap100:0.3_0: he has laid down, and with senior monks.
tha-ap100:2.1_0: Just as a stilt longhouse of Migāra’s mother
tha-ap100:3.1_0: I lie down happily and lie down,
tha-ap100:3.2_0: my mind released from this flowers,
tha-ap100:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap100:4.4_0: There is the fruit of this fruit.
tha-ap100:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap100:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saviṭṭha.
tha-ap100:8.1_0: the eighth part of the senior monks with furniture.
